Description: - Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve sales targets- Build and maintain relationships with existing clients, while seeking new business opportunities- Conduct market research to stay ahead of the competition- Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients- Create and deliver sales reports to managementSkills
Skills:
Ability to analyze the goal, target customer, and challenges to overcome before planning sales-oriented activities.
Proven track record of maintaining professional ethics through the portrayal of exemplary soft skills.
Approaching new and existing customers by following optimum consumer service standards.
A high level of focus on driving sales with consistent performance and teamwork.
Portraying superb soft skills during customer interaction and seminars as per requirement.
Depicting remarkable command to convert leads into customers through passionate discussions and debates.
Ability to work in pressure.
